thread.title: Germany ramps up Dieselgate probe, searching Audi offices, Volkswagen HQ, law firm
thread.title_full: Germany ramps up Dieselgate probe, searching Audi offices, Volkswagen HQ, law firm

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Germany ramps up Dieselgate probe, searching Audi offices, Volkswagen HQ, law firm
text: The ongoing scandal known as Dieselgate appears be winding down in the U.S.--at least as far as the federal government is concerned. In Germany, however, things look to be getting worse, not better, for Europe's biggest automaker, and that could mean renewed troubles for Volkswagen on this side of the pond. Within the past week, Volkswagen has...
